类 org.jasig.cas.authentication.AbstractAuthenticationHandler
的使用

使用 AbstractAuthenticationHandler 的软件包
org.jasig.cas.adaptors.generic   
org.jasig.cas.authentication Authentication validates the Credentials provided during a /login request. 
org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler.support Authentication.support contains the specific implementations of the AuthenticationHandler interface. 
 

org.jasig.cas.adaptors.generic 中 AbstractAuthenticationHandler 的使用
 

org.jasig.cas.adaptors.generic 中 AbstractAuthenticationHandler 的子类
 class FileAuthenticationHandler
          Class designed to read data from a file in the format of USERNAME SEPARATOR PASSWORD that will go line by line and look for the username.
 class RejectUsersAuthenticationHandler
          AuthenticationHandler which fails to authenticate a user purporting to be one of the blocked usernames, and blindly authenticates all other users.
 

org.jasig.cas.authentication 中 AbstractAuthenticationHandler 的使用
 

org.jasig.cas.authentication 中 AbstractAuthenticationHandler 的子类
 class AcceptUsersAuthenticationHandler
          Handler that contains a list of valid users and passwords.
 

org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler.support 中 AbstractAuthenticationHandler 的使用
 

org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler.support 中 AbstractAuthenticationHandler 的子类
 class AbstractPreAndPostProcessingAuthenticationHandler
          Abstract authentication handler that allows deployers to utilize the bundled AuthenticationHandlers while providing a mechanism to perform tasks before and after authentication.
 class AbstractUsernamePasswordAuthenticationHandler
          Abstract class to override supports so that we don't need to duplicate the check for UsernamePasswordCredential.
 class HttpBasedServiceCredentialsAuthenticationHandler
          Class to validate the credential presented by communicating with the web server and checking the certificate that is returned against the hostname, etc.
 class JaasAuthenticationHandler
          JAAS Authentication Handler for CAAS.
